text: I don't really care about money. I find money boring and accounting boring, so I'm probably not going to ever make a lot of money.
author: Juliana Hatfield

text: The music business is motivated by money. Music is motivated by energy and feelings.
author: Erykah Badu

text: The flood of money that gushes into politics today is a pollution of democracy.
author: Theodore White

text: Spare no expense to save money on this one.
author: Samuel Goldwyn

text: Here I am paying big money to you writers and what for? All you do is change the words.
author: Samuel Goldwyn
